description:
Buy one on Amazon: https://lon.tv/qgd68 (compensated affiliate link) - SanDisk's new high capacity SSD runs completely silent and offers much faster performance vs. a traditional mechanical external drive. It is available in 4 and 8TB versions. See more storage: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLCZHp4d1HnIt8dBD0HlxZInZMny4pS2MJ and subscribe! http://lon.tv/s
